sourceMeaningMnemonic: "A <radical>scooter</radical>!" you <radical>announce</radical>. You are announcing this because you decided this is what you would <kanji>create</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine being at a maker's contest. Each person has to announce loudly what they'll create, then they have to create it.
readingMnemonic: But, a scooter has been <kanji>create</kanji>d before. What is different about yours? The scooter you will create is specifically designed to keep <reading>zo</reading>mbies (<ja>ぞう</ja>) busy.
readingInfo: Imagine the scooter you created with a zombie on it. It's a perfect place for the zombie to get stuck and scooted off into nowhere.
